name: simsiangchoon
description:
Founded in 1986, Sim Siang Choon Hardware Pte Ltd is today one of the leading specialist retailers of bathroom,
        kitchen and home-improvement products in Singapore. Over the years, the company has grown into a major retailer
        and distributor, holding a portfolio of exclusive distributorship in bathroom and kitchen products numbering 42
        brands.
author: PhoneGap Team
